titles.title: Cell-Site Simulator Warrant Act of 2023
Cell-Site Simulator Warrant Act of 2023
To amend title 18, United States Code, to regulate the use of cell-site simulators, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Intelligence (Permanent Select), Energy and Commerce, and Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Communications and Technology.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
